course_description: Practical, applied course on how to express political ideas using the video medium. This course is appropriate for students with no prior experience in video production. This course also addresses the theory of political television advertising, political documentaries and commentaries.
sections: Class Nbr: 1994, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: C. Brown, Status: Open
